title: PES EC Campus CSE AIML (kcet) vs MSRIT CSE Cyber(comedk). Please help me choose.
content:
Kindly share your opinions about the choice and i need to give up comedk seat if u choose KCET. Kindly help with the procedure also.
Thanks in advance.

comments.body: if fees is not an issue then i would say msrit

It's mostly equivalent. Your life or opportunities won't change much either way. 

Make your decision based on the fee, location and campus amenities or something like that
See even the distance if u have less traveling time ull be more free personally if I travel too much I'll be tired as shit for collge and won't have mood to study at home.
I am out of Bangalore student. Will br staying in hostel
Msrit I would say  if no fee issue if not then pes ec is also gud only it's not bad
MSRIT is better PES has very high intake
Ofc pes ai ml + kcet so high advantages
Yes PES do have higher intake than MSR.
OK sir pes greatest college in india
Yeah both rr and ec has combined placement just focus on what branch you prefer . If you like aiml then pes if cyber then msrit. Here you gotta look into branch not college.
Same situation but msrit cse comedk
you are joining all college maybe lol (i meant your flair)
